Description: You have failed to ensure that the exposure of your employees to a substance hazardous to health ie carbon dioxide (generated during the fermentation process), which can result in asphyxiation, is adequately controlled in that appropriate work processes, systems and engineering controls have not been applied: a single monitor was located in the shed; the monitor had not been calibrated; there were no external visual indicators of the atmosphere within; there were no means to aid ventilation; and, there were no personal monitors in use.
